transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Abhinav ji very good morning.
Customer: Ha good morning madam.
Executive: Main Shreya baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Actually kal apni baat hui thi na sir?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Maine aapko bata kal apni baat hui thi na sham mein?
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Maine aapko bataya bhi tha sir ki aap November aur October mein matlab kafi kam active rahe ho jiski vajah se aapki inquiries thodi down ho gayi hai but daily ke basis pe ek ek inquiry aapko aa rahi hai. Clear kiya tha na sir aapko kal ye?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: To aap se baat karke maine aap se bola tha ki sir active ho jao aur jo bhi woh inquiries vgera hongi main aapko WhatsApp pe share karwa lungi kyuki aapke catalog proper update hai aur matlab sari cheeze matlab updated hai. To fir wapas se Rajat ji ne ticket open kar diya hai ispe. Aur unhone concern raise kar diya hai. Ha aur baat bhi hui thi aur unhone ye bhi likh diya usme ki Shreya se matlab like wo receive nahi kar rahi hai call. Jab kal maine unko call kiya to wo receive nahi kar rahe the aur out of network aa raha tha aur abhi bhi maine call kiya sir to wo matlab reachable nahi aa raha hai unka number.
Customer: Achha theek hai main ek baar baat karta hu aaj.
Executive: Please aap unko boliye ek baar mere se baat kare main aapko bata deti hu aur ek baar main aapko data bhi bhej deti hu dekho 19 se 25 October ke beech mein aapne bilkul bhi buylead buy nahi kiya hai. Theek hai? Uske baad 26 se leke 1 November ke beech mein aapne buylead buy nahi kiya. Abhi aap do teen din se active hue hai. But aapko daily ke basis pe ek ek inquiries ja raha hai. Hai na?
Customer: Theek theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai. To ye cheez aap please unko clear kijiye aur ha nahi hota to ek baar meri baat kara dijiye wo mere se baat bhi karna chah rahe hai to please ek baar unse meri baat karwa dijiye sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai baki cheeze to maine aapko kaha hai waise follow karo nahi to buylead vgera buy karo active jyada ho jao. Jo bhi inquiries vgera aati hai main aapko WhatsApp pe share kar deti hu waise aapko bhi lead manager mein dikh jayengi. Rating review customer se thoda jyada mang lo sir. Jis apne ko customer traffic jyada aayegi aur jo bhi paid list pe call aa rahi hai wo answer karo aap miss nahi honi chahiye.
Customer: Theek hai mam main baat karke ek baar aapko dobara acknowledge karunga.
Executive: Please please Abhinav ji unse baat karwa dijiye meri ek baar. Theek hai? Kyuki unhone complaint mein dal diya hai ki main call receive nahi kar rahi hu aur main baat nahi kar pa rahi hu aur main call kar rahi hu to wo receive nahi kar rahe hai sir.
Customer: Theek theek hai main jab bhi available hote hai na aap se baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Okay okay.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was less active in Nov & Oct.

- Executive wants to talk to Rajat regarding issue.

- Rajat complained executive not receiving calls.



Resolution:

- Executive shared details of customer's activity.

- Executive offered to share inquiries on WhatsApp.

- Executive asked to follow instructions and buy buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will talk to Rajat and acknowledge.



Alert (If Any):

complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, active, inquiries, complaint
